mapper.insert: insert into member_table (member_id, member_pw, member_nickname, member_phone) values (#{member_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_nickname}, #{member_phone})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member_table where member_id = #{member_id}
select count(*) from member_table where member_nickname = #{member_nickname}
select member_id, member_pw, member_nickname from member_table where member_id = #{member_id} and member_pw = #{member_pw}
